credits: This game was created because I truly
believe in the awesomeness of the Soviet
PC Vector 06c that shaped my life._PARAG_BREAK_
Big thanks to my amazing family for
working hard to make it a reality!_PARAG_BREAK_
and especially to ivagor, nzeemin, svofski,
and jerry for their contribution and help!

game_stats: good in this epic quest! Time to celebrate
with a royal feast of popsicles watching a
lowdown on your epic journey below:_PARAG_BREAK_
Keep your sword sharp and your heart brim-
ming with courage, for new quests!

no_health: Oh, not this! ..must save.. friend - said the
hero and fell into the deep, chilling darkness.
Seemed as if all hope was lost. But then,
knocked_his_home_door: I'm ditching this popsicle pie, right, but I'm
not done! I gotta track down my buddy Natias,
no doubts about it. He never vanishes without
a word. I'm getting all kinds of worried!
knocked_his_friend_door: Friend's mom: Natias ain't here now. He's left
early. Be a sweetie and fetch dried clothes
from the backyard, and I'll give you a
knocked_his_friend_door_no_clothes: Friend's mom: Oh, sugar, no clothes means
no pie, remember? We had a straight-up deal.
knocked_his_friend_door_clothes_returns: Friend's mom: Sweetie, you're the best
helper in the world! Here's a fresh-baked
popsicle pie, piping chill. Hurry and take
it home before it warms up!
hero_gets_sword: I don't believe my eyes, It is a legendary
sword, no doubt about it! Who would have
imagined my friend left it for me? This sharpy
little boy will free my friend in no time!
knocked_dungeon_entrance: Oh no! Is it only a demo? So unfair! But
this is not the end! I can hardly wait to
recount the entire story once it's complete!
hero_gets_spoon: A spoon??! No, the spoon! The most iconic
and ancient spoon ever designed, a masterpiece!
Popsicle pie missed you sooo much...
hero_use_pie: This popsicle pie is so delicious! I wish I had
my mouth big enough to swallow it all at
once. Until then, I definitely need a spoon.
hero_use_clothes: Deal's a deal! Promised to fetch and bring
the dry clothes, so get to it!

storytelling_home: Rad day for my morning jog! Legs are ready
If it's all about collecting, count me in!
storytelling_farm_fence: Oh my glob, guess what? Mom's on a cabbage
quest, and you know what they say - no
cabbage left behind! Gonna scoop up those
leafy greens like a true adventurer!
storytelling_road_to_friends_home: Wait a minute! Who's the cheeky one
cluttering up the road? Gotta snag a hero
thingamajig to clear the path for some
storytelling_friends_home: Check it, my buddy's cave! He said he'd
be around today. Gotta jog his memory
storytelling_friends_backyard: Really??? It looks like a hidden lair in
the bushes! I'm gonna investigate my
friend's secret spot. Those bones at the
storytelling_friends_secret_place: Oh no, there are bones and skulls all over
the place! I worry my friend can be in a real
danger! I gonna find and rescue him no matter
storytelling_crossroad: I'm shaken! A terrible monster and the corpses
of our beloved villagers! It's clear who the
culprit is here! You better be trembling!
I'm going to teach you a lesson!!!
storytelling_loop: You better watch out, little rolling furry
burner, because there's no escaping from me!
storytelling_lost_coins: Wow, wow, wow!!! My intuition never fails me!
I just knew there had to be treasures on this
heroic journey! Everyone, look at my pockets,
coins are about to overflow them!
storytelling_farm_entrance: Every time I lay eyes on cabbage, I get all
hungry up in here. But you gotta watch out,
'cause if you munch too much, your tummy
storytelling_farm_storage: Who's that dude on my road? Not cool
for us, he's shieldless. Time to fuel
up with cabbages to overspook him!
storytelling_dugeon_entrance: Wily skeletons and a wall of fire - that's
a real hero's challenge! Gotta figure out
how to extinguish it before they surrender
hero_use_cabbage: Cabbages... so yummy-wummy! I can feel
myself getting all rested up and fresh!
But my tummy does little ghrrr...
hero_use_spoon: Finally, feasted on my favorite popsicle-pie!
Oh, what's this? Some snowflakes left behind.
I'll just pop'em in my pocket, you never know
what might come in handy on an adventure!
hero_freeze_monster: Aha! So that's how it works. If you're all
spooky and scary, get a snowflake to the
noggin! It'll chill you out a bit!
